name: Downtown Pizza Co.
description: Neighborhood pizzaiolos firing naturally leavened pies in a 450°C oven with market toppings and house-made chili honey.

featuredDishes.description: Cup-and-char pepperoni, roasted garlic crema, basil oil.

featuredDishes.name: Green Olli
featuredDishes.description: Pesto bianco, grilled zucchini, ricotta salata, lemon zest.

name: Bombay Spice Kitchen

featuredDishes.name: Goan fish curry

description: Broth-obsessed crew simmering pho for 18 hours and stacking banh mi with herbs flown from Saigon markets.

featuredDishes.name: Crispy prawn rolls

name: Sushi House
